hexoNode.js

# 

*  [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) Node.js  npmhexo  Node.js v0.6  Node.js
* node,
```bash
node -v
```
* 
```bash
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
// 
npm config get registry
// npm info express
```

* hexohexo

```bash
npm i -g hexo-cli
npm i -g hexo
```

* 

> 1 help  
  2 init []  hexo
  3 version  hexo
  4 --config config-path _config.yml
  5 --cwd cwd-path 
  5 --debug 
  6 --safe 
  7 --silent 
  8 generate 
  9 clean 
  10server 
  11deploy 

# 

```bash
hexo init myBlog
```



# 

source/_posts/start.md

```bash
hexo new "start"  #,start
```

```bash
  ---
  title: 
  date: 2017-04-08 12:11:50
  tags: hexo
  ---
```
---

# 

Hexo, hexo, Hexo, , [themes](https://hexo.io/themes/)


```bash
git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next

#./_config.ymlnext
theme: writing

#
hexo g       #hexo generate
hexo s       #hexo server
```
[next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)

# github
deploy
```bash
# Deployment
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: https://github.com/sakitam-fdd/sakitam-fdd.github.io.git
```


```bash
hexo deploy  #
